name: Prelude to an Epilogue
description:
This game is my story. On Monday 19 January 2015 I came out to my parents. It was a very difficult experience, and it's certainly changed our worlds forever.

It also took place entirely through apps. I guess that's the reality of 2015.

Made for Global Game Jam 2015. The (very fitting) theme was: "What do we do now?"

Thanks to Dale North for the musical track. It is moving and amazing.

Thanks Cody for editing all of the text.

Thanks Koyo, Donna, Stuart, Drew and Lex for voice acting in my games.

You are all wonderful friends.
